Articles.Content:
I want to Nasa spaceflight and saw the new Space Shuttle Control room and i was amazed by it and I wonder what the Mission Control will look like in the Future.

Here are some Images

The image are just concepts.

They already showed the internal of what I would guess was the mission control building. Granted, that was quite a while ago and it was for a promotional video for the game....but they might recycle that or use that as a starting point for what they implement into the game at some point.

Either way, it should be good.
